item.title: Understanding OAuth 2.0: Explore with Amazon Cognito
item.description: Difference between OAuth2.0, OIDC and SAML2> Difference between OAuth2.0, OIDC and SAML2 # OAuth 2.0 provides authorization using ID token. OIDC provides authentication using access token. SAML2 provides both authentication and authorization.
